title: Capstone team
content: What is the minimum number of people required to form a team for the capstone research project and can cse aiml ppl be in the same team

comments.body:
3 in a team is minimum.   
About whether CSE and AIML can be in the same team, I am not sure, contact your capstone coordinator for it
yes cse students can pair up with ai ml students
I heard students with similar cgpa can't form teams together.. is that true?? Is there a specific criteria or smth??
yes could someone answer this please?

Nah they are more like a guidelines not the rules - Captain Barbossa 

In reality they don't care about that in fact you will get a better guide if you have a good overall cgpa in a team lol.
It is all sheeet, nobody cares, make up good groups so that you get better guides :)

Yes 
They want diversity 
And also apparently there is some gender diversity stuff too
